description: Easy and quick vegan tuna salad that's mayo-free. Made with white beans and hearts of palm, it's a delicious tuna alternative.
keywords: jackfruit tuna salad, plant-based tuna salad, vegan tuna salad
name: Vegan â€œTuna Salad
recipeIngredient: 15 ounce Great Northern white beans (drained, rinsed, and patted dry)
2 tablespoon Dijon mustard (for best results avoid stone ground mustard)
Ground sea salt and black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the beans in a medium bowl until they're creamy, but you can still see smaller pieces.
Add the chopped palm hearts, bell pepper, onion, celery, dill, 1 tsp (more if you like a strong flavor) Old Bay seasoning, 2 tbsp mustard, and salt and pepper and stir to combine.
